languages.text: "Я беру этих несчастных под защиту. Они — жертвы мутации, а не злодеи".
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."
languages.original_text: "Я беру этих несчастных под защиту. Они — жертвы мутации, а не злодеи".

traits.locale_text: "I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are the victims of a mutation, not malefactors."
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are the victims of a mutation, not malefactors."
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not demons."
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not daemons."
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."
"I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."

languages.text: «Acogeré a estas pobres almas bajo mi protección. Son víctimas de una mutación, no villanos».
languages.original_text: "I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."

traits.locale_text: «Acogeré a estas pobres almas bajo mi protección. Son víctimas de una mutación, no villanos».

languages.text: « Je vais prendre ces âmes damnées sous ma protection. Ce ne sont pas des criminels, mais les simples victimes d'une mutation. »
languages.original_text: "I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais prendre ces âmes damnées sous ma protection. Ce ne sont pas des criminels, mais les simples victimes d'une mutation. »

languages.text: “我会保护这些不幸的臣民。他们是突变的受害者，不是天生的恶人。”
languages.original_text: "I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."

traits.locale_text: “我会保护这些不幸的臣民。他们是突变的受害者，不是天生的恶人。”
“我会保护这些不幸的臣民。他们是突变的受害者，不是天生的恶魔。”

languages.text: 「これらの不幸な魂を私の庇護下に置こう。彼らは変異の犠牲者であり、悪党ではない」
languages.original_text: "I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."

traits.locale_text: 「これらの不幸な魂を私の庇護下に置こう。彼らは変異の犠牲者であり、ディーモンではない」
「これらの不幸な魂を私の庇護下に置こう。彼らは変異の犠牲者であり、ディーモンではない」

languages.text: "Diese armen Seelen stehen ab sofort unter meinem Schutz. Sie sind Opfer einer Mutation, keine Verbrecher."
languages.original_text: "I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."

traits.locale_text: "Diese armen Seelen stehen ab sofort unter meinem Schutz. Sie sind Opfer einer Mutation, keine Verbrecher."
"Diese armen Seelen genießen ab sofort meinen Schutz. Sie sind Opfer einer Mutation, keine Dämonen."

languages.text: "Bu zavallı yaratıkları korumam altına alıyorum. Mutasyona kurban gitmişler. Kötü değiller."
languages.original_text: "I take these unfortunate souls under my protection. They are victims of a mutation, not villains."

traits.locale_text: "Bu zavallı yaratıkları korumam altına alıyorum. Mutasyona kurban gitmişler. Kötü değiller."
